text.section: In this section, "lease" means the rental or leasing of a vehicle for a period exceeding 180 days.

The Administration may conduct investigations and inquiries and require additional information concerning:
Any application made to it under the Maryland Vehicle Law; or
Any other matter subject to the jurisdiction of the Administration.

Each person who leases a motor vehicle, trailer, or semitrailer to another person shall keep a record of:
The registration number of the leased vehicle; and
The name and address of the lessee.
Any police officer or authorized representative of the Administration may inspect the records kept under subsection (c) of this section.
